data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: This picture describes a woman shopping at a cloth shop. She is looking at a white tablecloth with some patterns. It seems the store is outdoor, and there are many other visitors outside the store. This reminds me of an experience in the past. I travelled with my family to a town near Sydney last year. It was a heritage town where you can buy all kinds of things in the market. There were a lot of people walking into one particular shop that sells cloth. I was also attracted by the cloth it sells because the patterns are truly aesthetically appealing. Therefore, I bought a tablecloth just like the one in this picture.
